__prompts__.package_name: Your Python package name, in snake case (e.g. my_package)
__prompts__.license: Pick an open source license for pyproject.toml file, see https://choosealicense.com/ for details
__prompts__.author: Author name for pyproject.toml file
__prompts__.dev_python_version: Python version for local development, in {major}.{minor}.{micro} (e.g. 3.11.8)
__prompts__.token_name: Your GitHub token, codecov token and cloudflare token name (better to be the same name), if you want to automatically setup CI/CD for your project
__prompts__.aws_region: Your AWS CodeArtifact region name, e.g. us-east-1
__prompts__.aws_account_id: Your 12 digits AWS Account Id where you put your CodeArtifact domain, e.g. 111122223333
__prompts__.aws_codeartifact_profile: AWS CLI profile for publishing package to AWS CodeArtifact, e.g. your_aws_codeartifact_profile
__prompts__.doc_host_aws_profile: AWS CLI profile for publishing document website to AWS S3 bucket, e.g. your_doc_host_aws_profile
__prompts__.doc_host_s3_bucket: AWS S3 Bucket to store document site historical versions
__prompts__.cloudflare_account_alias: Your cloudflare account alias, we need this to locate the token file
